text: Jiří Čadek (7 December 1935 – 20 December 2021) was a Czech footballer. He played as a defender. Čadek played his whole professional career for Dukla Prague. He appeared in 328 league matches. He was a member of the Czechoslovakia national team and played at the 1958 FIFA World Cup. Čadek died on 20 December 2021, at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile at Hall of Fame Dukla Praha website * Profile at ČMFS website Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Czechoslovak footballers
title: Jiří Čadek
